column2:
"...yes, that was the regulated wording.
Did you read it? Did you understand it?
Simply put, that is how it is."

"If you achieve the specified conditions,
your free movement in the
Amduskia Dragon Altar will be approved.'"

"There are no other conditions.
There is also no further follow-up.
So, now it's up to you."

"It's up to you whether you accept it or not. I will only honestly judge your
abilities here."
